item.title: Build Your Own Blog with Hugo - Local Hosting
item.description: Hugo is a framework to build websites, and lots of templates are provided for various purposes. This blog is also built on Hugo with the Basic theme by @siegerts, and based on my experience, I’m introducing how to build a blog with Hugo on mac. For a really quick start, you can visit the official site. Install Hugo The Hugo website lists up a couple of ways to install Hugo on mac.
